front.title: The HTTP header for the Platform for Privacy Preferences 1.0 (P3P1.0)

abstract.t: The Platform for Privacy Preferences 1.0[4] (P3P1.0) specification describes how to associate a privacy policy with each URI request. Such associations are contained in a so-called policy reference file. This draft describes a new HTTP response header which indicates the location of such policy reference file. This header is intended to be a part of the P3P1.0 framework and should be treated in the full context of the P3P1.0 specification[4].
